title: Battery Replacement for Pixel 3XL
content:
Hi guys 

My phone battery has expanded, and it not safe to continue to use the phone. I need to replace the battery. However we donâ€™t have Autheized dealer for google nor we have spares for google pixel 3XL battery in Saudi Arabian market. Is there anyone who can ship to me a battery for replacement ? 

if there is a model from other brands that uses same battery, could you please advise. 


Sincerely,
